text: SNH48 is a large Chinese youth girl group established in Shanghai, China in 2012. It is currently the largest youth girl group in the Chinese-speaking world and is affiliated with Shanghai Siba Culture Media Group Co., Ltd. SNH48's basic positioning is based on the concept of 'idols you can meet', featuring an internet-based approach and participatory spirit as a close-contact, developmental large-scale youth girl group.

In addition to the Shanghai headquarters, current sub-groups include BEJ48 centered in Beijing, GNZ48 centered in Guangzhou, CKG48 centered in Chongqing, and CGT48 centered in Chengdu. SHY48, established in 2017 and centered in Shenyang, completely ceased operations after Siba Media reorganized its groups on January 19, 2019.

SNH48's early performances and EP and album releases were Chinese covers of AKB48 Group songs. On June 9, 2016, AKB48's management stated that SNH48 violated the contract and would reassess SNH48's management and remove all SNH48-related information and advertisements from the AKB48 official website. SNH48's management responded the next day, June 10, 2016, stating there was no violation and that the relationship was a technical cooperation. They also removed AKB48-related information from the SNH48 official website, effectively terminating the cooperative relationship.

SNH48 operates with an O2O (Offline To Online) idol SNS (Social Networking Services) as its basic operational model, with Star Dream Theater located at 267 Jiaxing Road, Hongkou District, Shanghai as its dedicated physical theater. Its alliance framework covers sub-groups, teams, and individuals, incorporating internal competition mechanisms and gamified growth logic in the development process.

Important annual activities include the Idol Popularity General Election in summer and the Annual Golden Song Awards in winter. Members who win first place in the Idol Popularity General Election for two consecutive years are promoted to the SNH48 Group Star Hall of Fame and establish their own personal studios. Group members interact with fans primarily through Siba Media Group's proprietary channels such as Pocket48 and third-party cooperative internet interactive platforms, realizing a completely internet-based idol development operational model.

SNH48 important milestones include: 2012 recruitment of 1st generation; 2013 recruitment of 2nd generation; 2015 release of official mobile application 'Pocket48'; 2017 sub-unit 7SENSES officially debuted, Ju Jingyi became the first member promoted to SNH48 Group Star Hall of Fame; 2019 Li Yitong promoted to SNH48 Group Star Hall of Fame; 2020 participated in 'Youth With You 2', 'Chuang 2020', 'We Are Blazing', 1st generation graduation; 2021 participated in 'Girls Planet 999', Sun Rui promoted to SNH48 Group Star Hall of Fame; 2024 Yuan Yiqi promoted to SNH48 Group Star Hall of Fame.
SNH48 Group Star Hall of Fame includes Ju Jingyi, Li Yitong, Sun Rui, Yuan Yiqi.
